titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide additional payments under the environmental quality incentives program for implementation of a nutrient management practice, and for other purposes.
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide additional payments under the environmental quality incentives program for implementation of a nutrient management practice, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 117-343.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 257.

bill.summary:
This bill directs the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to provide additional payments to producers under the Environmental Quality Incentives Program for implementation of a nutrient management practice.
USDA must provide the payments through FY2023 and may use up to 5% of the funding to provide technical assistance.
